product.title: Kawaii Flower Black White Cat Plushies | NEW
product.body_html:
• Description
  • FAQ
  • Shipping

  • Welcome a lifetime filled with snuggles

    Cuddle up with a cute black or white cat tonight! Jazz up your sofa or bed with this lovable little feline plush, sporting a fluffy exterior material and a flower wrapped around its neck. Lay back in peace with this cushy kitty nearby, whether you're taking a cat nap, watching a flick, or ready to sleep. The ideal present for the cat-obsessed friends and family! Filled with 100% pp cotton to make it extra cuddly.

    Available in two colors and measures 30cm in height.

    Your problems will melt away with this plushie by your side

    If you need some serious snuggle time, this cat plushie is ready to wrap you up in a warm hug. It'll help you de-stress and relax whenever tough times roll in.

    The perfect gift for your loved ones!

    It's time to show your family and friends some love with the cutest plushies around! Need to make someone grin or make a special occasion extra special? Our cuddly toys will do the trick - put a permanent smile on their face today! Find more adorable plushies at www.kawaiies.com.

    Features

    ✨ Filled with 100% premium PP cotton
    💖 Promotes relaxation with its unbelievably soft material

    Plushie sizes:

    Measurements may be off by 1-5cm depending on the animal you select as the tail, ears, and legs may vary in length. Carefully choose the size and variant you would like before purchasing our plushies.

  • Do you ship worldwide? Yes, we ship to over 300 countries and are proud to provide free shipping to the United States, the United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, and many countries in Europe.

    What are the plushies filled with?     All our plushies are filled with High-Quality Premium PP Cotton with an outer layer so soft you won't want to stop hugging it.

    Does this help with anxiety and sleep?     Our plushies are crafted for maximum comfort, so you will find no trouble sleeping when cuddling our Kawaiies plushies. Just check out what our customers say about them below.

    Can I wash my plushie?     Yes, you can by following these 5 simple steps:

    Step 1:     Use the gentlest cycle available on your washing machine.

    Step 2: Wash our plushie in cold water using a mild detergent.

    Step 3: If disinfecting is a concern, use warm water or consider using a product like Lysol Laundry Sanitizer, which is safe on both whites and colors, unlike chlorine bleach.

    Step 4: Place the plushie in a launderable mesh bag or duvet cover. Padding the drum of the washer with towels can also add another layer of protection. Recommended!

    Step 5: Air-drying will be the gentlest choice, and a hairdryer turned on low heat can help to fluff up the fur once the plushie has reached the just-damp stage (think of it as a finishing touch!)

  • International Tracked Shipping to the United States, Canada, United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, Germany, Spain, France, Italy, Netherlands, and many more. Find out more here: Shipping Policy.

    Packaging time: 1-3 Business days

    Shipping time: Est 5-30 Business days
